dmca.title: DMCA TAKE DOWN NOTICE
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Jeremy Burns [mailto:jeremy@jeremyburns.com] 
Sent: Wednesday, March 21, 2007 4:22 PM
To: Copyright
Subject: DMCA TAKE DOWN NOTICE

DMCA TAKE DOWN NOTICE

Sender Information:
Seven Fourteen Inc.
Jeremy Burns
7201 Haven Ave. #E-355
Alta Loma, California, 91701, USA
Tel: 800-714-0297
Fax: 800-714-0297
jeremy@jeremyburns.com

Recipient Information:
ThePlanet.com
1333 Stemmons Freeway, Suite 110
Dallas, TX 75207
US
Ph. 214-782-7800
Fx. 214-782-7756
copyright@theplanet.com

Sent via: email & fax

Re: Notice of Infringement under DMCA;


http://www.thejvzone.com/affilprogs/scgm4/

I am writing to you regarding a matter that has been brought to my
attention by 4 of my clients now.

In this particular matter your office represents

66.98.170.210
http://www.thejvzone.com/affilprogs/scgm4/

   WDDA
   Stuart Halpryn
   admin@wdda.org
   3312 Illinois
   Baytown, Texas 77520
   United States
   435-518-9784

(1) Currently Mr. Halpryn, is engaging in the act of illegally
reselling our copyrighted works in a manner that is against our resell
license terms at a webpage located on your servers. 17 U.S.C.
512(c)(3)(A)(ii-iii)

http://www.thejvzone.com/affilprogs/scgm4/

Our work may be seen for verification at

http://www.sourcecodegoldmine.com/v4/

and our resell terms are located at

http://www.sourcecodegoldmine.com/v4/terms.html



(2) You can see our website in which these works are located at
HYPERLINK "http://SourceCodeGoldMine.com and also the terms this
person is violating at the same site as required in 17 U.S.C.
512(c)(3)(A)(iv)

Mr. Halpryn is reselling our content with resell rights to others, and
he does not have the right to do so.

We have contacted Mr. Halpryn regarding this matter to no avail.

The product titles in question at as follows:

Where In The World Is My Keyword
Email Stats
Profit Sponder
Personal Sales Letters
Internet Marketing Newsletter In A Box
The List Building System Video Tutorial
Step By Step Product Creation Video Tutorial
Affiliate Recruiting Secrets
Ebay Profits 2007
Co-Reg Cash

(3) While we do sell resell rights to these products our terms that
must be agreed upon by all resellers upon purchase state that never
may more than two (2) products be sold in any one bundle or on any one
website.

It also states that the reseller my never use the names "Jeremy Burns"
"Source Code Gold Mine" or SCGMv4 in their marketing efforts.

Mr. Halpryn has broken these terms in which he agreed to and we are
now asking that he stop reselling our products against the terms to
which we agreed to upon purchase.

(4) We do have very little doubt that Mr. Halpryn is unaware of our
terms due to the email he is sending to resell these products where he
mentions "he'll probably run screaming to his lawyers"

Here is a copy of that email:

If you'd like to get Master Resell Rights to the
very newest products available - Jeremy
Burns' Source Code Gold Mine 4 - at prices
so low that he'll probably run screaming to his
lawyers - so low that those 'money grubbing,
get them for everything they can' marketers
will probably have conniption fits and start
flaming me all over again, then go right now to:

http://NetActivated.com/scgm4.htm

and grab every one of them, 'cause in roughly
72 hours, the price will almost double......

regards,
stuart
http://TheJVZone.com -
NetActivated's PREMIER Affiliate Program!
http://NetActivated.Com -
If you DIDN'T buy it from NetActivated, you
paid WAY too much!

P.S.
Want WAY too much software with FULL Resell
Rights for under 9 Cents EACH? Get it before
it's gone - http://ygm.net/ava4

P.P.S.
Have you been to our MEGA Sale? EVERYTHING
that you need to fully stock up - at
NetActivated Prices! http://ygm.net/mega-sale


(5) We are asking that Mr. Halpryn remove our copyrighted content from
his website, and notify all persons that have purchased our material
in his illegal sale about his error on this site that he did not have
rights to resell this material in this manner and that his customers
also do not have rights to either use or resell this content.

We also request that Mr. Halpryn refund these any customers all monies
paid for these illegal sales of our product, and that a list of these
refunds be sent to us for verification.

 (6) Please expeditiously remove, or disable access to, the material
that is infringing on our copyright

I have a good faith belief, and in fact know for certain, that the
posting of these works was not authorized by myself, or any agent of
my Seven Fourteen Inc.

I declare under penalty of perjury that this information is accurate
and that I am authorized to act on behalf of SourceCodeGoldMine.com in
this matter.

I hope you will process this request ASAP before any more damages are
done to my business than what have already occurred.

Sincerely,

Jeremy Burns



Seven Fourteen Inc.
7201 Haven Ave. #E-355
Alta Loma, California, 91701, USA
Tel: 800-714-0297
Fax: 800-714-0297
jeremy@jeremyburns.com
